Name: In Retrospect
About the game: Are you prepared to travel back into your memories and tell me about your life, in retrospect? Features: • Craft your own story and gameplay based on which collectibles you focus on! Health, wealth, love, education, creativity, or spirituality? What direction will your life take? • Music and gameplay synchronicity! Every stage has its own song that often syncs with the gameplay! • Do more than just run! Swim, walk, fall, and ride on and in things! • Custom button system grants special moves and power-ups, and every stage introduces a new button to explore! • Over 100 different platforms, enemies and hazards! There is always something new to see! • Leaderboards! Compete in over 40 challenge stages for the top spots! • And much, much more! In Retrospect is being developed in Toronto (formerly Chicago) by Paper Salamander Games.
